testcase.name: Order a product and complete checkout
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Order a product and complete checkout Given I am on the inventory page ... passed in 0.993s When user sorts products from low price to high price ... passed in 0.323s And user adds lowest priced product ... passed in 0.126s And user clicks on cart ... passed in 0.146s And user clicks on checkout ... passed in 0.142s And user enters first name John ... passed in 0.216s And user enters last name Doe ... passed in 0.161s And user enters zip code 123 ... passed in 0.183s And user clicks Continue button ... passed in 0.150s Then I verify in Checkout overview page if the total amount for the added item is $8.63 ... passed in 0.069s When user clicks Finish button ... passed in 0.186s Then Thank You header is shown in Checkout Complete page ... passed in 0.096s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
